column1:
In Their Own Words focuses on the perspectives of four young, non-binary individuals. It is not meant to represent the views or experiences of all non-binary people.

In Their Own Words was produced by outLoud, a project of Youth Radio that amplifies the voices of LGBTQ+ young people.

Producers: Desmond Meagley, Teresa Chin
Design: Desmond Meagley, Asha Richardson, Teresa Chin
Contributors: Desmond Meagley, Paulina Ortega, Malia Disney, Jen Tribbet
Developers: Shanya Williams, Asha Richardson, Radamés Ajna
Editors: Lissa Soep, Ellin O'Leary, Elena Botkin-Levy

Youth Radio is a national network of next-generation reporters, artists, and storytellers. If you're one of the above, join our community by emailing contact info and links to pitch@youthradio.org.

Designed and developed by Youth Radio Interactive, where our students mix journalism, design, and code.
